unicef-spe11.def: The Vast Majority Income Ratio measures the income ratio of the first 80% (vast majority) in the income ranking.
unicef-spe11.name: VMIR (vast majority income ratio)
unicef-spe11.source: UNICEF estimates based on World Development Indicators. Last update: February 2021.
unicef-spe11.dataset: UNICEF estimates based on World Development Indicators. Last update: February 2021.
